trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Expõe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> tipos a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave de acesso para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave de acesso para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controlo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos subordinados do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "MenuItem".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém "MenuItem".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a etiqueta de texto do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade name pode considerar como a cadeia de texto que um utilizador utilizaria para explicar o controlo está a ser referido.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: É importante que tenha uma representação textual para todos os controlos de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para que programaticamente pode fazer referência ao controlo de forma localizada.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que contém a etiqueta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controlo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> object.
trans-unit.target: Se um dos seguintes casos ocorrer, este método devolve atual <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>que está associado este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>tem subordinado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> does not have child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>que está associado este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>não tem subordinados <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>que está associado este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>tem a propriedade checkable definida `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, este método devolve um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que suporte o padrão de controlo se patternInterface é um valor suportado; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
